description: Businesses and homes across the island have been without internet access for almost two days.
title: Manx Telecom broadband outage affects 4,000
title_page: Manx Telecom broadband outage affects 4,000 - BBC News
maintext: Eight post offices have been impacted and customers collecting benefits and pensions have been advised to use the Douglas facility on Strand Street, which has not been affected.
